name: Moto X Stunt Bike Racing Halloween Hill Climb
name_original: Moto X Stunt Bike Racing Halloween Hill Climb
description:
Welcome to the exciting Halloween GAME.
Your favourite Trick-Or-Treat time of the year has come again. So try moto bike racing in the town in Halloween Night.
This is a fast-paced bike racing game.
You will never dare to drive so fast in the real world! So control your moto with incredible fast speed in the night of Halloween town. And survive yourself from hurdles of Halloween

The fabulous features of Free Moto Racer Halloween Town

=> Very addictive racing game play.
=> Hundreds on the road.
=> Play regularly to improve your skills.
=> Super cool bike stunts.
=> Extremely amazing bike physics.
=> Fun and excitement guaranteed.
=> Simple, easy and intuitive controls.
=> Don't forget to get upcoming free updates with lots of new contents.
=> Best bike racing game today for IOS devices on Itunes store.

Easy to learn, but hard to master!
So enjoy feeling the super speedy and thrilling moto racing in Halloween night! Please give us your feedbacks, and rate or comment if you like this game!
